title: A sermon on Acts xxviii, 22 shewing, that the Christian religion is not a sect, and yet that it is every where spoken against / by Matthew Henry ...
author: Henry, Matthew, 1662-1714.
publisher: Printed for, and sold by Thomas Parkhurst ...,
notes: Also appears as part of A discourse concerning meekness and quietness of spirit (Wing H1475) at reel 420:12.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
